post.body: you play halo?
right back at you!
And yes, I do web design and development. I checked out your blog, nice interface. Clean and to the point.
lol...its contagiousness is intentional..I hope others follow the same commandment!
Just noticed your @ comments. Jeeze, I'm mad late...Anyway, thanks!
Firstly, it depends on which cereal you eat. And secondly, you can lose weight by eating big macs if you burn it off afterward.
lol! That would be extremely awkward for...non-mosque-goers....
Agreed...I think it could have been much worse, all shoes should be banned from airports or any public event! lol
Hitting the sack late today...Just finished watching a pretty decent movie, About Schmidt...I am taking tomorrow off btw :)
problem shortly after, and workers will be laid off anyway.
Getting ready to train. Although this auto bailout will help its employees in the short term, I predict that we will all face the same
If anyone wants me to build and develop their website at a 25% total discount, you have less than two weeks to request a free quote!
What doesn't kill you will inevitably define you...
Getting ready to train...Humans need to evolve, and I am on the verge of pursuing that goal. Stop de-evolution!
let your peoples know! www.PennyWebDesign.com
Taking a well deserved break by watching a Simpsons episode before I begin my arduous training... Oh, btw, 25% sale is gonna go bye bye soon
just did my shopping...kind of...the malls are definitely emptier this year around..The slumping economy must be hitting many people hard...
Screwwww thissss...lol, I'm going shopping!
My 25% off holiday sale will be ending after Christmas! www.PennyWebDesign.com
I think I have awoken from the delusions of infinity...Everything in life is numbered....
I am relaxing at home with my family....
Getting ready to train...
My Super Holiday Sale has been extended for the entire holiday season!!! www.PennyWebDesign.com
going to BJs to fill up my pantry
Get 25% off..that's a quarter off your entire project's price! www.PennyWebDesign.com
Since the incredible turn out of my Super Holiday Sale, I have decided to extend the sale for the rest of the holiday season!!!
My heart goes out to the people of Mumbai....
I am pondering on extending my super sale since I have received such positive feedback and high demand.
Dreaming of better days....
I find it so amusing to see people doing things incorrectly, and then thinking that in fact, they are not guilty. That's called incompetence
I didn't get enough sleep :(
Have a goodnight...But no more than eight hours!
Benefiting from long days or long nights compared to the complete opposite result from a long slumber is simply paradoxical and quite unfair
drivers is very fun! about to cook me some dinner...that's right, i cook! lol
Umm...well driving in the heavy rain surrounded by small floods you don't see on the highway until you hit them, and along side incompetent
Gotta do some driving in the ugly, rainy, and cold weather.....
Thou shall not de-evolve.
Training....Evolution cannot afford to take any days off, for de-evolution is an opportunistic disease. De-evolution thrives in a stalemat.
Well..i was gripping my armrests at the theater for the entire length of the movie...Quantum of Solace ROCKED...
Going to go see Quantum of Solace with a special somebody, despite the negative reviews most people have given the movie.
Anyway, time to train.
CNN is actually showing a live stream on cnn.com
Someone got a full face implant in Cleveland! Watch CNN for updates.
I strive for a minimum of 7 hours everyday. How many hours of sleep do you all usually get?
I do not understand why most people place sleep under the category of, "wasted time." A good sleep will promote ultimate efficiency!
Anyway...goodnight.
I haven't seen snow in a while....While it looked pretty cool, I'd much rather be on a beach in Florida...
Goodnight/early morning
Had an incredible training session....
It is only in the absence of light, when all hope is gone, and when everyone is lost, does a Hero emerge. Otherwise, we're all heroes.
My son did all that he could to disallow me from sleeping...And he succeeded.
Very tired...Challenging week ahead. And wow at Bush being ambushed by flying shoes...What is this world coming to? Violence is prevailing..
I have a feeling that the snow will only get worse throughout the winter. I need to move to somewhere tropical...
Thou shall not be motivated by taste, but by necessity and function...
I am IN LOVE with the Hero series...Actually, I think I'm addicted.
The roads are treacherous....
oh yea....it's snowing alright.
Evolution is often a violent and imperfect process. Morality loses its meaning; it's either survive...or perish...- Hero
taking it nice and easy.
My day off today....going to just take it easy.
